module.p: beag small, little is an adjective.

Examples from Gairm –
Ma rannsaicheas sinn air ais fada gu leòir chì sinn nach robh sgoilean anns an Oban gus an ochdamh linn deug. Bha an sgoil bheag a b’ fhaisge air anns a’ Chill Mhóir cóig mìle air falbh, agus tha e coltach gu robh an sgoil sin air an fheadhainn bu shine an Earra-Ghaidheal.
If we research back long enough we will see that there were no schools in Oban until the eighteenth century. The closest little school was in Kilmore five miles away, and it appears that that school was one of the oldest in Argyll. td. 363
[...] ’Se glé bheag de chobhair a thug a’ Phàrlamaid a riamh do ’n Ghàidhlig no do fhoghlum agus do litreachas na Gàidhlig. Cuin a chualas ball-Pàrlamaid a’ togail a ghuth a dh’ iarraidh leasachaidh do staid Gàidhlig ann an Albainn?
The Parliament has given very little assistance ever to the Gaelic language or to Gaelic education and literature. When has a member of Parliament been heard raising his voice to demand improvement for the state of Gaelic in Scotland? td. 9, ‘Air an Spiris’
